decks.subject: 5ths Disease (slapped cheek disease)
decks.signs_symptoms: rash/ upper respiratory infection/ flu-like symptoms/ sick 24 days

decks.subject: Measles (Rubeola)
decks.signs_symptoms: fever/ rash/ malaise/ anorexia/ achy/ conjunctivitis/ cough/ coryza/ spots

decks.subject: Mumps
decks.signs_symptoms: orchitis/ headache/ gland swelling/ earache/ fever/ malaise/ anorexia/ swollen lymph nodes
decks.nursing_interventions: supportive care/ hot or cold press

decks.subject: Rubella (German Measles)
decks.signs_symptoms: rash/ swollen lymph nodes/ arthritic joint pain/ cough/ fever/ upper respiratory infection

decks.subject: Pertussis
decks.signs_symptoms: cough whooping/ fever/ cyanosis/ upper respiratory infection
decks.nursing_interventions: antibiotics macrolides (patient + family)/ oxygen (in hospital)/ fluids + humidity/ suction/ rest
